0: The waterside location is excellent for sitting on the lovely patio and watching boats or for walking up down the river walk

Right in the middle of Tampa close to downtown on the trolley line to Ybor City and next to the cruiseport the Tampa Mariot Waterside Hotel is probably the best hotel in downtown Tampa especially for a pre cruise stay
The location was great to jump on the highway or catch a game at Amalie Arena it is almost right next door
The location was on the water and there was a river walk to see things nearby
5 you can walk along waterside on paved paths and the trolley is across the street if you do not want to drive to places like Ybor City
The hotel is nicely located within a very short walking distance to all of these as well
However it is a beautiful facility and very conveniently located to the convention center
my view was AWESOME plenty to do within walking distance and you have the trolley that runs like every 12 hr vending machine STOCKED ON THE MAIN FLOOR SO THEYRE EASY TO FIND
The positives are proximity to the conference center the view and the pool area which is lovely and comfortable
1: I stayed at this location for a convention over the weekend and had a terrible experience

particularly if you use a separate email address for these kinds of thingsThe hotel is in an ok location lots of walking along the waterway from the hotel the convenience market is just across the waterway about a 10 minute walk the historic street car to Ybor City is in front of the hotel apparently this used to be a factory and docks area so there is much new development and no real neighborhood around
2: The other positive is that a modified Starbucks is located within the building
Stayed at the Mariot Waterside because of the location on the water
The location is nice for access to the waterfront though it would be nicer if there were more shops and restaurants nearby
I was told to walk outside the hotel and find someone with the shuttle because you see they are a vendor

If you want the full Starbucks experience there is an Embassy Suites hotel right across the trolley tracks from the Mariot very close and the Embassy Suites downstairs lobby has a full service Starbucks with food and it is open I believe all the time
They are renovating it but remaining open so the noise on upper levels where the supposed nicer rooms are located are subjected to construction noise
Outside of getting to the location which there is no quick way to get there
There was even a shuttle to the cruise port 5 a person

It took A LOT of sleuthing because even though I had the van receipt and drivers name when they called the company they were told the driver was an independent contractor for airport pickups and without the actual van there was no way to know how to contact him
Your basically paying for a view and the location
